thread.section_title: Eiffel Villa Garibaldi - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy and Inviting
thread.title_full: Cozy and Inviting - Review of Eiffel Villa Garibaldi, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jessica V
title: Cozy and Inviting
text: My husband and I just got back from spending 6 nights in this wonderful little place. Central location- definitively get familiar with the Metro to save time and money from taxi rides to all the major site. The rooms were small, but clean- and the front desk was AMAZING. So kind and professional. Every night there was wine and cheese for a few hours- so wonderful.
